Ok people , I forgot to mention that when you crack the original gta3.exe you have to mount the disc and copy the directory called ''audio'' from the cd in to your games main directory (ex. C;\Program Files\Rockstar Games\GTA 3). Have PHUN!
Btw , It isn't necessary to use a crack , just keep GTA3.iso mounted in Deamon Tools that way you can play too.
